description: This file appears to be a bitbake recipe include file (`.inc`) related to configuring and building `libgfortran` as part of the GCC toolchain in a Yocto Project build environment. It contains functions for configuration, compilation, and installation, as well as dependency and package definitions.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment for libbacktrace and libgfortran targets.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Builds the libbacktrace and libgfortran libraries.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the built libgfortran libraries and cleans up directories.
